ARABIC: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَٰبٍ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Knowledge of them is with my Lord in a Book. My Lord does not misplace nor does He forget.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Moses) replied: "Knowledge of that is with my Lord (recorded) in the Book. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "Its knowledge is with my Lord, recorded in the Book. My Lord does not err, nor does He forget."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses replied, "The knowledge about it is with my Lord in the Book. My Lord is free from error and forgetfulness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Their knowledge is with my Lord, (recorded) in a Book; my Lord neither strays nor forgets.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Musa] said: "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord, in a Record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a book, my Lord errs not, nor does He forget;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said Moses, 'The knowledge of them is with my Lord, in a Book; my Lord goes not astray, nor forgets --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a Record. My Lord neither erreth nor forgetteth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "My Lord alone has knowledge of that, recorded in a Book. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Musa said: the knowledge there of is with my Lord in the Book; my Lord erreth not, nor He forgetteth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Their knowledge is with my Lord, in a Book. My Lord neither makes any error nor forgets.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He replied: "The knowledge of that is with my Lord, duly recorded: my Lord never errs, nor forgets,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Musa (Moses)] said: "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord, in a Record. My Lord is neither unaware nor He forgets, "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Moses) answered: 'The knowledge of them is in a Book with My Lord. My Lord neither goes astray, nor forgets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Knowledge thereof is with my Lord, in a Book. My Lord never errs, nor does He forget.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:52] Said he, Moses, ‘The knowledge thereof, that is, the knowledge of their [otherworldly] status, is, preserved, with my Lord, in a Book, namely, the Preserved Tablet (al-lawh al-mahfūz), and He shall requite them in accordance with it on the Day of Resurrection. My Lord does not err, He is [never] absent from anything, nor does He, my Lord, forget, anything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 340 (He said) Moses said: (The knowledge thereof) the knowledge of their destruction (is with my Lord) written down (in a Record) i.e. the Guarded Tablet. (My Lord neither erreth) He does not make mistakes nor is He oblivious to their matter (nor forgetteth) their matter and leave them unpunished,
